name: Add new Salesflare opportunities to a Google Sheets spreadsheet as new rows
description: Every time a new opportunity is created in Salesflare, Make will automatically add that opportunity to a new row in a Google Sheets spreadsheet. The template uses this [example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1ht1Je-EFhJQwZTQp1OVjdNt6aVGeS62SN3JaHCthI1s/edit?usp=sharing).
